Matta Hu'uri.body_ability: Deploy (Ranged): If neither player has passed and your opponent's hand is not full, they draw the lowest-cost card, and you draw the highest-cost card.
Matta Hu'uri.body_ability_html: Deploy (Ranged): If neither player has passed and your opponent's hand is not full, they draw the lowest-cost card, and you draw the highest-cost card.
Matta Hu'uri.name: Matta Hu'uri

Maxii Van Dekkar.body_ability:
Deploy: Look at your deck in order from top to bottom.
You may shuffle your deck, then put a card on the bottom of it.

Deploy: Look at your deck in order from top to bottom.

Megascope.name: Megascope

Moon Dust.body_ability_html: Purify a unit and damage it by 4.

Damage a unit by 4.
Deathblow: Banish it.

Damage a unit by 4.
Deathblow: Banish it.

Portal.body_ability:
Deploy: Summon a random 4 provision unit from your deck to the left of this card.
After 3 turns, Summon a random 4 provision unit from your deck to the right of this card.
Portal.body_ability_html:
Deploy: Summon a random 4 provision unit from your deck to the left of this card.
After 3 turns, Summon a random 4 provision unit from your deck to the right of this card.
Portal.name: Portal

Reckless Flurry.body_ability:
Order: Split 3 damage randomly between all enemy units, ignoring their Armor.
Charges: 3

This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.
Reckless Flurry.body_ability_html:
Order: Split 3 damage randomly between all enemy units, ignoring their Armor.
Charges: 3

This ability adds 15 provisions to your deck's provisions limit.

Renew.body_ability: Play a unit from your graveyard with a provision cost of 9 or less and give it Doomed.
Renew.body_ability_html: Play a unit from your graveyard with a provision cost of 9 or less and give it Doomed.
Renew.name: Renew

Snowdrop.body_ability:
Zeal.
Order: Draw 2 cards, then shuffle 2 cards back to your deck.
Whenever you draw a card, boost self by 2.
Snowdrop.body_ability_html:
Zeal.
Order: Draw 2 cards, then shuffle 2 cards back to your deck.
Whenever you draw a card, boost self by 2.
Snowdrop.name: Snowdrop

Sunset Wanderers.body_ability:
This card starts in the leftmost position of your hand.
At the beginning of your turn, while in hand, move self one position to the right then boost self by 1.
At the end of your turn, if you haven't passed and there are no cards to the right of this card, Summon self from your hand to a random allied row, then draw a card.
Sunset Wanderers.body_ability_html:
This card starts in the leftmost position of your hand.
At the beginning of your turn, while in hand, move self one position to the right then boost self by 1.
At the end of your turn, if you haven't passed and there are no cards to the right of this card, Summon self from your hand to a random allied row, then draw a card.
Sunset Wanderers.name: Sunset Wanderers

Resilience.
Deploy: Spawn a Svalblod Fanatic on both sides of this card.
Order: Damage adjacent units by 2.
